casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Philip D. Knott (5978)

Daly, Norcott and Foti, Js.

Argued December 13 decision released December 19, 1989 *815Michael R. Corsello, special public defender, with whom, on the brief, was Randy L. Cohen, for the appellant (defendant). Leah Hawley, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Eugene Callahan, state’s attorney, and Warren Murray, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
